title: Sideways Snow (Water Falls Down, #2).
description: Sideways Snow, because a storm is only as good as its victim.Lynn is on the run again, this time involving a whole cache of new characters. Finding herself stranded in the wilderness underprepared and overwhelmed, Lynn discovers she's in for the fight of her life. Adventure meets misery in this compelling and provocative story of teenage angst and self-discovery.The second book,in the Water Falls Down series.
author: Danielle Rohr
